summary: A struggling dancer in L.A. teams up with a young club impresario to bring back disco.
cast: Romina D'Ugo|David Giuntoli|Adam Brooks|Brooklyn Sudano|Shauna MacDonald|David Keeley|Jennifer Miller|Jacqueline MacInnes Wood|Dewshane Williams|Yasmine Aker|Kevin McGarry|Shawn Byfield|Miles Faber|Natalli Reznik|Cedric Smith|Ofilio Portillo|Jason Derulo|Natalie Krill|Pastel Supernova|Dwayne Hill|Kevin Jubinville|Adam Waxman|Karl Campbell|Caroline Torti|Tammy Nera|Janaye Upshaw|Breanne Wong|Rick Kuperman|Jade Anderson|Damien Lavergne|Jeff Kuperman|Tamina Pollack-Paris|Kristinia DeBarge
title: Turn the Beat Around
